LanguageData.ResearchEMBasic.label: Basic Tattoos and Pigments
LanguageData.ResearchEMBasic.description: Craft basic pigments and tattoo designs from the pigment pit, these can be used to bolster abilities. Basic tattoos cover hands and feet.
LanguageData.ResearchEMAdv.label: Advanced Tattoos
LanguageData.ResearchEMAdv.description: More tattoo designs that can be used to bolster abilities, advanced tattoos cover legs and arms.
LanguageData.ResearchEMComp.label: Complex Tattoos
LanguageData.ResearchEMComp.description: Even more tattoos can be used to bolster abilities, complex tattoos cover someones back or chest.
LanguageData.ResearchEMPigments.label: Pigment Mixing
LanguageData.ResearchEMPigments.description: Create four more pigments and tattoo designs with new bonuses - basic, advanced, and complex.
